title: Ctradingtimes
author: Ctradingtimes
content: You don't need to wait all day or guess the market we have created the new system with times.So the next Trading hours for traders right now. You can share this with your friends so Even when market fall we can still provide together liquity and push the coins up.Your suggestions are welcome aswell this one will be best way.Latest info:  Welcome to CRYPTO Trading times.*(You can copy paste this info and share it then all the entry positions will get better liquity)You can Open Long leverage or use spot market buying.LONG positions time-sheet. few minutes to 30min reflection trading.5 times daily trading hours. Trading UK London time zone. NB- If there will be fault in the trading we will change the info or times will be updated here.LONG positions opening times: 8:00 / 14:00 / 19:00 / 21:00/ 00:00Cryptocurrencies: SOL / LTC /LINK

If it works i can make 5 times per day profit that's nice thank you bro Im ready i have good feeling about this.

comments.author: slaman29
comments.body: Wow. Newbie account is system admin, posts amazing time based trading nobody ever heard of before and 2 other posters say bro it's working.So I have to believe this. Because never has it happened that sure-profit signals lose on this forum right?Post screenshots and verifiable trade ID plus platform of every single trade "bros". Then we can start taking you seriously maybe?

comments.author: Ctradingtimes
comments.body: Quote from: slaman29 on October 31, 2023, 08:12:32 AMWow. Newbie account is system admin, posts amazing time based trading nobody ever heard of before and 2 other posters say bro it's working.So I have to believe this. Because never has it happened that sure-profit signals lose on this forum right?Post screenshots and verifiable trade ID plus platform of every single trade "bros". Then we can start taking you seriously maybe?Please look the chart like 15-20min Ago the opening time for long positions was UK time 8:00 and did you see? SOL price went up and same was yesterday what proof more do you need ? So now we all provide syncronized cordinated liquity to the coin we want will move up. The next opening time 14:00 this way we could push the price up until 00:00  because we have 5 times per day opening times. While you talk negative please look into project deeper to understood we the crypto people should together to make money.So far good thanks for all love and support

comments.author: dansus021
comments.body: Guaranteed profit??In a couple of months ago I got a Direct Message from an unknown person through telegram and he said he admin of a gambling site and could make me win and he wanted profit sharing for me he sent me proof but then he disappeared because I didn't want to make a deposit with my own money and he keeps resist me to deposit.

comments.author: kingvirtus09
comments.body: You're encouraging other communities here to read your post, right? Is it guaranteed income that you want to convey to us here? How can you convince us if you can't show proof that what you say is true?In short, you will have a hard time convincing or believing people like us here who have been on this forum platform for a long time. What do you think about the communities here? Do you think you can easily convince the communities on this platform?

comments.author: Ctradingtimes
comments.body: Quote from: kingvirtus09 on October 31, 2023, 11:20:12 AMYou're encouraging other communities here to read your post, right? Is it guaranteed income that you want to convey to us here? How can you convince us if you can't show proof that what you say is true?In short, you will have a hard time convincing or believing people like us here who have been on this forum platform for a long time. What do you think about the communities here? Do you think you can easily convince the communities on this platform?It's 11:24 time in UK London as it's financial capital we follow UK time.Now it's 11:24 you want to see proof watch the coins then how they move. Off course little pre-pump will start 15-10min early as people getting ready to entry early before the main fireworks. So in UK time 14:00 next opening time previous opening times traders getting ready like 20-10min before opening.Just watch and you see yourself.

comments.author: redsun114
comments.body: I see no other benefit for you than getting people to follow your social media channels, so please don't make people lose their money just for that. No actual traders would follow signals, patterns, or strategies posted by random people on public forums and only newbies might do that. I don't think that newbies are recommended to trade futures as they lack the necessary knowledge and experience to be trading futures and they should stick to learning and maybe trading in the spot market.So, I believe most people will simply ignore these trade times and trade signals and that's probably the right thing to do. It's always better for a trader to only trade based on their own knowledge and experience and if they don't have that, they should first try and acquire that and then venture into trading.
